drop Z and/or M dimensions from feature geometries

drop Z and/or M dimensions from feature geometries, resetting classes appropriately

st_drop_zm(x, ...)

Arguments

x
object of class sfg, sfc or sf
...
ignored

Examples

st_drop_zm(st_linestring(matrix(1:32,8)))
#> LINESTRING(1 9, 2 10, 3 11, 4 12, 5 13, 6 14, 7 15, 8 16) 
#> 
x = st_sfc(st_linestring(matrix(1:32,8)), st_linestring(matrix(1:8,2)))
st_drop_zm(x)
#> Geometry set for 2 features 
#> geometry type:  LINESTRING
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: 1 ymin: 3 xmax: 8 ymax: 16
#> epsg (SRID):    NA
#> proj4string:    NA
#> LINESTRING(1 9, 2 10, 3 11, 4 12, 5 13, 6 14, 7... 
#> LINESTRING(1 3, 2 4) 
#> 
a = st_sf(a = 1:2, geom=x)
st_drop_zm(a)
#> Simple feature collection with 2 features and 1 field
#> geometry type:  LINESTRING
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: 1 ymin: 3 xmax: 8 ymax: 16
#> epsg (SRID):    NA
#> proj4string:    NA
#>   a                           geom
#> 1 1 LINESTRING(1 9, 2 10, 3 11,...
#> 2 2           LINESTRING(1 3, 2 4)
#>
